title: How do I get my Talkband B1 started?
answer:
1. Go to Google Play or App Store, search for Huawei TalkBand, and download it toyour phone.  

2. Turn on your B1 and check that the Bluetoothicon is blinking and the time is 00:00. You can then pair up your B1 and yourphone.  

3. Turn on Bluetooth on your phone to search for and display the nearby Bluetooth devices. Touch Huawei B1 to pair it with your phone.  

4.  After your B1 is paired with your phone, run theTalkBand app, flick left on the wizard screen to go to the home screen, andswipe down on the screen to synchronize the data to your B1 for the first time.After the time and information are initialized, you can start to use your B1.
